_header: Behold how it is come to pass
Subjects: songs; mystery plays, English songs in
_description: Second song at the end of the Weavers’ Pageant in the Coventry cycle (6822) — three quatrains, abab

CovArc112.First Lines:
Beholde how hit ys come to pasethat manye yeres before was
                    tolde…
CovArc112.Last Lines:
…Recownfort vs bothe gret & smallthat yn thy trewthe we
                    lyve & dye
CovArc112.Note:
On p. 32 is name ‘James Hewyt’ written below this song,
                    possibly early performer?
CovArc112.Editions:
Craig,  Hardin,
                        ed.  
             Two Coventry Corpus Christi Plays.
EETS
         e.s. 87 (1902; 2nd ed. 1957); repr. 1967: 70-1.
